name: Outlook OWA - Dark.Mode Meteor
description:
A dark-mode theme inspired by Nina Geometrieva - Meteor Wallpaper set found on Dribbble.
It's certainly not perfect so is very much still WIP, but it's my first one.
additional_info:
Current Bugs:
When returning back to a Draft email or copy/paste formatting inside the same email, the styling sometimes gets carried over. 
So you might need to double check the formatting of your emails before sending them.

This is a theme forked from "Outlook | Darkness by d3ft0n"

Credits goes to d3ft0n, for setting the foundations.
Also to Nina Geometrieva for the initial wallpaper.
